positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: •Part of the 23 - member Core Team which is responsible for Publicity, Sponsorship and Event Management•Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 17 Campus Representatives responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020•Penned down write-ups that were published on various social media platforms, website and souvenir of Kshitij•Approached eLearning Platforms and Publishers to have them as Knowledge Partner in Kshitij 2020•Coordinated with the team members to conduct Robotics Workshop and Guest Lecture in ML and AI in Kolkata with a participation of over 800 students
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
•Part of the 23 - member Core Team which is responsible for Publicity, Sponsorship and Event Management
•Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 17 Campus Representatives responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020
•Penned down write-ups that were published on various social media platforms, website and souvenir of Kshitij
•Approached eLearning Platforms and Publishers to have them as Knowledge Partner in Kshitij 2020
•Coordinated with the team members to conduct Robotics Workshop and Guest Lecture in ML and AI in Kolkata with a participation of over 800 students

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: •Part of the 40 - member Team which is responsible for the publicity of the fest and final execution of all its events•Assisted the participants in explaining them the events and helping them with their robots at the time of the event•Managed event Embetronix and Laws of Motion with allotted Core Organising Team Member•Publisized the fest in the regions of Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar and Visakhapatnam
positions.title: Kshitij Campus Affiliate
positions.description_html:
•Part of the 40 - member Team which is responsible for the publicity of the fest and final execution of all its events
•Assisted the participants in explaining them the events and helping them with their robots at the time of the event
•Managed event Embetronix and Laws of Motion with allotted Core Organising Team Member
•Publisized the fest in the regions of Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar and Visakhapatnam
